name: COSMIC CONTACT VIRTUAL ORACLE DECK
description:
PLAY FOR FREE! 

(Free version only meant for Desktop/Laptop Browsers. Does not work on mobile phones through the browser)

Get a digital local version of the VR COSMIC CONTACT ORACLE DECK for Windows & Android. It, features a dynamic card shuffle and selection system + a full card directory. The application was made using Unreal Engine 4. This product gives you access to Windows Android versions that include access to the full card directory. Card features: 45 Oracle Cards 5 Prayer Cards 5 Affirmation Cards 15 Unique Psychedelic Backs GET THE PHYSICAL DECK!: https://aliensymbology.com/products/cosmic-contact-oracle-deck
